items.sentence: In Japan, the new school year begins in April.
Instead of going to school, he stayed at home.
Is Tom still planning to go to Boston with us?
I\'ve been thinking about the meaning of life.
I\'ve just been to the airport to see her off.
If I start eating potato chips, I can\'t stop.
If Mary slapped Tom, I\'m sure he deserved it.
Tom always crosses his t\'s and dots his i\'s.
Tom promised me that he wouldn\'t tell anyone.
Tom realized that what Mary said wasn\'t true.
Tom said that he didn\'t want to be disturbed.
Tom said that he doesn\'t regret his decision.
I\'m not sure that that\'s what Tom has to do.
Tom didn\'t speak French when I first met him.
Tom didn\'t tell Mary what she wanted to know.
Tom didn\'t tell me what I was supposed to do.
Tom didn\'t think the rain would last so long.
Tom didn\'t understand what Mary really meant.
Tom didn\'t want Mary to babysit his children.
I had enough time, so I didn\'t need to hurry.
